name: Don't Push
description:
Dwarven Software is a small game developer started by husband and wife.

Don't Push is the first official game from Dwarven Software by the wife ;)
This is my first solo project for the weekly game jam - week 59. The theme was Pacifist.

There is just one simple rule; Don;t push the button!

Enjoy!

And keep an eye out for us we have BIG plans :)

Greetings

Annemarie
Dwarven Software

Note:

The art is all made by me.
The music/sound effects are from:
Loading screen loop - Brandon Morris
https://opengameart.org/content/loading-screen-loop


Sirens - Aquinn
https://opengameart.org/content/sirens-and-alarm-noise

Birds chirping sounds - Syncopika
https://opengameart.org/content/bird-chirping-sounds

Big Explosion - Blender Foundation
https://opengameart.org/content/big-explosion
